abstract: Among the highest priorities is closing a deal to sell some of Yahoo’s stake in the Alibaba Group of China back to that company, in a deal that could reap billions of dollars.
snippet: Among the highest priorities is closing a deal to sell some of Yahoo’s stake in the Alibaba Group of China back to that company, in a deal that could reap billions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: As Yahoo’s latest chief executive and newest board members settle into their roles, they will be confronted with the same problem that has bedeviled their predecessors: how to fix one of Silicon Valley’s most crisis-plagued companies.

headline.main: New Cast Atop Yahoo Faces Stubborn Troubles

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
